commentBody: Silly article, demanding immediate retirement. It's not like there is anything to do till next Sept. He will announce when he is ready. Bribing up HGH really hurt's the writer's credibility, given that the accusations were withdrawn by the accuser himself and were found to be baseless. Nobody outside of NE would do this, because it makes them feel better about their proven cheating team.

replies.commentBody:
HGH is banned by the NFL because it is a performance enhancer.

HGH shipped to one of the greatest QBs in the history is a major story, especially where Manning hasn't denied it.
